'''Walk Like King Deshret's People''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to light up every sigil on the [[Scarlet Sand Slate]]. This grants the player clearance to interact with all formerly sealed devices within the Sumeru desert and can be completed through the ''[[Dual Evidence]]'' world quest.

==Trivia==
* The achievement name references the song "{{w|Walk Like an Egyptian}}" by The Bangles. This is fitting as the monuments left by King Deshret's people draw heavy inspiration from Ancient Egyptian art, architecture, and practices.
